channel.title: [508] need help with a custom slayer system PLEASE HELP!

item.title: [508] need help with a custom slayer system PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @latvians latvians
item.description:
@latvians wrote:

/** Slayer system **/
if ((npcType >= 1 && npcType != 15000)) {
p.SP++;
p.SP++;
p.appendExperience(2000, 18);
p.message(“You gain 2 Slayer Points and 2000 Slayer experience!”);
}
else if(p.skillLvl[18] >= 70) {
p.appendExperience(4000, 18);
p.message(“You have 70+ slayer and gain 4k exp!”);
}

Read full topic
item.source: [508] need help with a custom slayer system PLEASE HELP!

item.title: [508] need help with a custom slayer system PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

hey everyone, so ive been working on a custom slayer point/exchange system. i have the basic system completed but im trying to add a feature so that when you reach lets say level 40 you get 3k exp per kill instead of 1k exp per kill. heres my code, whats happening is that when i kill an npc, i get both the 2 slayer points, 2k exp, and 4k exp for being lvl 70 slayer. I Want to make it so when you reach the a certain level, it eliminates the first exp. so when you reach lvl 30 lets say, you get the 3k exp instead of 2k exp… i know its a bit confusing, any help is greatly appreciated (: heres my code…

PLEASE HELP!!!

/** Slayer system **/ if ((npcType >= 1 && npcType != 15000)) { p.SP++; p.SP++; p.appendExperience(2000, 18); p.message("You gain 2 Slayer Points and 2000 Slayer experience!"); } if(p.skillLvl[18] >= 70) { p.appendExperience(4000, 18); p.message("You have 70+ slayer and gain 4k exp!"); }

Read full topic
item.source: [508] need help with a custom slayer system PLEASE HELP!
